text: Chappaqua (, ) is a hamlet and census-designated place in the town of New Castle, in northern Westchester County, New York. It is on of land on the east bank of the Hudson River. It is about north of New York City. Bill and Hillary Clinton live here. In the 2020 census, 2,598 people lived here. In February 2024, The Chappaqua Central School District had around 3,500 kids from Kindergarten to 12th grade. ==References== Category:Hamlets in New York (state) Category:Census-designated places in New York (state)
title: Chappaqua, New York
